categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
The elizaOS/eliza repository has seen significant development activity with multiple pull requests addressing various features and improvements:

- Okulon contributed two important PRs: one integrating the Nillion frontend (#3391) and another implementing task storage functionality (#3377).

- New plugins have been added to expand the platform's capabilities, including an ether-guild plugin by t-phoenix (#3381) and a Shopify plugin by ayyubibrahimi (#3395).

- User aleksifuna added a custom character chatterbox feature (#3382), enhancing the platform's interaction capabilities.

- Code quality improvements were made with lalalune's refactoring of the generation code to follow the handler pattern (#3376).

- Major development is underway with the V2 Development PR (#3393) by lalalune, suggesting significant platform updates.

- Build fixes were implemented for the Sui Typhoon Hackathon scheduled for February 2025 (#3399) by manolaz.

- The Twitter client system message received edits through PR #3401 by ayyubibrahimi.

These contributions demonstrate active development across frontend integration, storage functionality, plugin ecosystem expansion, and core system improvements.

categories.title: Recent Issues in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub Repository

content.text:
Several issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository, highlighting various problems users are experiencing:

1. Quick start confusion (#3387): Users are experiencing confusion because the eliza-starter is in a different repository than the main eliza project.

2. Twitter integration issues:
   - Twitter Actions not processing properly (#3384)
   - A suggestion to enhance the Twitter AI Agent's human-like behavior and engagement efficiency (#3383)
   - Multiple replies being generated due to DEFAULT_MAX_TWEET_LENGTH configuration (#3394)

3. Technical problems:
   - Unable to use plugin-evm (#3380)
   - Agent getting stuck on startup in Docker/Cloud environments with version 0.25.6-alpha.1 (#3385)

These issues suggest ongoing development challenges with the Eliza platform, particularly around Twitter integration and general usability.

Several improvements were made to the CLI and build system in the Eliza project:

- Fixed issues with the CLI build and init commands (PR #3378)
- Refactored generation code to follow the handler pattern (PR #3376)
- Modified character loading to attempt loading from the repository root (PR #3375)
- Fixed a bug in the yargs slice functionality during character loading (PR #3374)
- Improved the build process by ensuring core is built first and added a dedicated `build:core` command (PR #3398)
- Fixed the root-level build command `bun run build` (PR #3396)

These changes collectively improve the reliability and structure of the build system and CLI commands.

Over the past two days (February 8-10, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant activity. The repository had a total of 27 new pull requests, with 6 of them successfully merged. There were also 7 new issues created during this period. The project maintained strong community engagement with 27 active contributors on February 8-9, which slightly decreased to 24 active contributors on February 9-10.
sources: From 2025-02-08 to 2025-02-09, elizaos/eliza had 13 new PRs (4 merged), 6 new issues, and 27 active contributors.
From 2025-02-09 to 2025-02-10, elizaos/eliza had 14 new PRs (2 merged), 1 new issues, and 24 active contributors.
